sentences.english: She not only sings like an angel, but also dances divinely.

definition: Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
